wikipedia_page.main: Air Commodore Dame Felicity Barbara Hill,  (12 December 1915 – 30 January 2019) was a British Royal Air Force officer. From 1966 to 1969, she served as Director of the Women's Royal Air Force. She died in January 2019 at the age of 103.

response: ** Felicity Hill, British Royal Air Force officer (d. 2019)
